directions: Combine potato flakes, dry milk, bouillon granules, onion, parsley, pepper, thyme, turmeric and seasoning salt in a bowl and stir to mix.  Pour into a 1 quart jar.
Attach the following instructions:  To serve, place 1/2 cup soup mix in bowl.  Stir in 1 cup boiling water until smooth.
title: Potato Soup Mix
